title: How to Make Fairy Cakes with Self Raising Flour

steps.headline: Fill a cake tin with 12 paper cases
Beat the sugar and butter together until creamy and light
Carefully add one egg and stir it in until the mixture is smooth.
steps.description: Do the same with the second egg

steps.headline: Sieve the flour into the mixture in the bowl
Add the milk and beat everything together until smooth
Drop a big spoonful of the mixture into each of the 12 cases
Cook in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until it feels springy and looks golden
Leave them to cool slightly in the tin, then lift them onto a wire cooling rack
Decorate with icing or eat them plain, either way they're delicious.

text: Set the oven to 180°C/350°F/Gas Mark 4.  Fill a cake tin with 12 paper cases  Beat the sugar and butter together until creamy and light  Carefully add one egg and stir it in until the mixture is smooth. Do the same with the second egg Sieve the flour into the mixture in the bowl  Add the milk and beat everything together until smooth  Drop a big spoonful of the mixture into each of the 12 cases  Cook in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until it feels springy and looks golden  Leave them to cool slightly in the tin, then lift them onto a wire cooling rack  Decorate with icing or eat them plain, either way they're delicious. Enjoy!
